title: Fragment, 200 BC–200 AD
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: embroidered in stem stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Fragments of a standing human figure wearing a mask, headdress and holding serpent staffs.  Completely embroidered in strong colors.
